aboutMe.description:
🔶 I am a grade 11 student at Northview Heights SS in the HMST and ICT SHSM programs 
 🔶 One thing I'm proud of is receiving the Computer Science award in grade 10 
 🔶 Physics is one of the subjects that I enjoy learning in school because it's very straightforward

🔶 I've been playing recreational tennis every summer since 2022 
 🔶 I also play badminton and table tennis in and outside of school 
 🔶 On some days, I tutor younger kids in math/science

🔶 I often go out to eat with my family to try different restaurants/foods we find 
 🔶 I love desserts (from pies to tiramisu) and bread 
 🔶 Recently, my obsession has been on sushi

🔶 I like programming even though I just recently picked it up. There's a certain calm that I feel while creating my projects 
 🔶 I like taking and looking at pictures of nature. (My laptop wallpaper is set to Windows spotlight (❁´◡`❁)) 
 🔶 My dream is to work in cybersecurity and help people
